Itemized Passive Description:
*Basic effect(s)*
- ATK & DEF 177%{passiveImg:up_g}
- Receives an additional Ki +3 per Rainbow Ki Sphere obtained
*Per "Representatives of Universe 7" Category ally on the
team*
- Ki +1 (up to +5)
- Damage reduction rate & chance of performing a critical hit
7%{passiveImg:up_g} (up to 35%)
*When 5 or more "Representatives of Universe 7" Category
allies are on the team*
- ATK & DEF 77%{passiveImg:up_g}
- Damage reduction rate & chance of performing a critical hit
17%{passiveImg:up_g}
*When HP is 77% or less*
- {passiveImg:once}Randomly changes Ki Spheres of a certain Type (INT
excluded) to Rainbow Ki Spheres
*When attacking with 17 or more Ki*
- ATK & DEF 77%{passiveImg:up_g}
*When attacking with 22 or more Ki*
- ATK & DEF 77%{passiveImg:up_g}
- Launches an additional Super Attack
*For every Rainbow Ki Sphere obtained*
- Chance of performing a critical hit 7%{passiveImg:up_g}
- All allies' Ki +1 and ATK & DEF 7%{passiveImg:up_g} (self excluded)

5710.superDescription:
Massively raises ATK for 1 turn, 
causes colossal damage to enemy and 
raises allies' ATK & DEF by 30% for 1 turn

SpecialBonus.Description: Super Attack power will be increased even more!
Super Attack power will be increased even more!

Active Skill.Name: Universe 7's Total Offensive
Active Skill.Condition Description:
Can be activated when facing only 1 enemy, 
whose HP is 50% or less, if there are 5 or more 
"Representatives of Universe 7" Category allies 
on the team, with 2 or more of them (self excluded) 
attacking in the same turn (once only)
